message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth $85 to you. Let's make this deal happen!
I'm really interested in the product, but $85 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can we meet in the middle at $77.50?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to consider your offer. In light of that, I propose a price of $79 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can we meet at $77?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering your offer, I propose a price of $76 for the product. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant to spend $76. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $74. Can we meet at this price?
I see your point, Bob. My final offer for the product is $75. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $73. Can we finalize the deal at this price?
Considering your latest offer, I'm willing to sell the product at $74. This is my final offer in this negotiation.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $72. This is my final offer. If you can accept this, we can finalize the deal.
